statements.update: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [News] WHERE [Id]=#Id#) UPDATE [News] SET [Category]=#Category#, [Title]=#Title#, [Content]=#Content#, [Attachments]=#Attachments#, [Status]=#Status#, [BrowseTimes]=#BrowseTimes# WHERE [Id]=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO [News] ( [Id], [Category], [Title], [Content], [Attachments], [Status], [BrowseTimes], [PublisherId], [PublishDateTime] ) VALUES ( NEWID(), #Category#, #Title#, #Content#, #Attachments#, #Status#, #BrowseTimes#, #PublisherId#, GETDATE() )
statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [Category] AS Category, [Title] AS Title, [Content] AS Content, [Attachments] AS Attachments, [Status] AS Status, [BrowseTimes] AS BrowseTimes, [PublisherId] AS PublisherId, [PublishDateTime] AS PublishDateTime FROM [News] WHERE [Id]=#value#

WITH CTE AS( SELECT [Id] AS Id, [Category] AS Category, [Title] AS Title, [Content] AS Content, [Attachments] AS Attachments, [Status] AS Status, [BrowseTimes] AS BrowseTimes, [PublisherId] AS PublisherId, [PublishDateTime] AS PublishDateTime, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [Id] DESC) AS RowIndex FROM [News]
) SELECT * FROM CTE WHERE RowIndex BETWEEN (#PageIndex#-1)*#PageSize#+1 AND #PageIndex#*#PageSize# ORDER BY RowIndex ASC
